abstract: Ireland defeats Scotland, 40-10, to win rugby's Six Nations Championship on points difference.
lead_paragraph: Ireland won at Scotland, 40-10, and won the Six Nations Championship on points difference despite big wins by England and Wales.

headline.main: Ireland Narrowly Wins Six Nations Title

snippet: Ireland won at Scotland, 40-10, and won the Six Nations Championship on points difference despite big wins by England and Wales.
